title: Walmart names John Furner its Walmart U.S. CEO
text: Walmart Inc. WMT, +0.57% said late Thursday that John Furner will become the president and chief executive officer of Walmart U.S., effective Nov. 1. Furner replaces Greg Foran, who held the post for five years and is moving to Air New Zealand Ltd. as its chief executive. Furner will report directly to Walmart Chief Executive Doug McMillon, the company said. Foran will stay with Walmart through Jan. 31 to ensure "a smooth transition," Walmart said. Shares of Walmart were flat in the extended session after ending the regular trading day up 0.6%.
